file(COPY  README bug_668.cir bug_668.cir.sh bug_668_probe.cir bug_668_raw.cir bug_668_raw_asciiprintline.cir bug_668_raw_printline.cir bug_668_tecplot.cir exclude tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_668.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PYTHON_NUMPY_FOUND AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_668/bug_668.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug_668.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_668.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_668/bug_668.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_668/bug_668.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;tecplot;raw;output;numpy;bug668")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND PYTHON_NUMPY_FOUND AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_668/bug_668.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug_668.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce>" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_668.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_668/bug_668.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_668/bug_668.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;tecplot;raw;output;numpy;bug668")
endif()
